channel.title: HP bar and chat doesn't show above head
channel.description:
Well, I have a problem. The HP and chat does NOT show if the player is IN COMBAT with an npc or another player. It is invisible. I get this when I use silab or mopar client, but not a client such as RichScape. I am using PvP Palace for my new server base. Is there anyway to have the HP visable using the moparscape or silab client?
I can't really supply any code as I have no idea what loads the HP bar or chat; except the chat packet. But if anyone has had this problem or does know how to fix it...it would be greatly appreciated!
